summary: Module import error in v0.23 where @temporalio/workflow imports from @temporalio/common but @temporalio/common is not declared as a dependency in workflow/package.json, causing 'Cannot find module' errors during builds.
userImpact: Users upgrading from v0.21 to v0.23 encounter build failures when the workflow package cannot locate the required common module.
rootCause: @temporalio/workflow depends on @temporalio/common in its source code but @temporalio/common is not listed as a dependency in workflow/package.json
resolutionDetails: Issue #688 was opened to fix the dependency declarations between workflow and common packages
keyQuote: @temporalio/workflow/lib/internals depends on @temporalio/common, but @temporalio/common is not defined as a dependency in workflow/package.json
